text:
This dish is a true visual and culinary delight. The barramundi fish fillet is perfectly seared to a crisp golden brown, with tender, flaky flesh beneath. A bed of fresh greens and finely shredded cabbage adds color, texture, and a refreshing crunch.

Topped with thinly sliced onions, microgreens, and a glossy sauce, the dish balances acidity and sweetness, enhancing the fish‚Äôs natural flavors. The thoughtful presentation and vibrant ingredients make this a must-try for seafood lovers. Elegant, fresh, and flavorful‚Äîthis dish is a standout!

Clean and spacious with a lovely peaceful atmosphere.
Food was great. We ate: beef burger with omu rice - quite an acceptable portion for the money - beef burger was juicy and tender; barramundi with shaved fennel and lunor potatoes - delicious,  the fish was cooked to perfection with crispy skin; sweet potatoes fries with truffle dip - crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, best sweet potatoes fries. A jug of water was $2.50, however, it was the most refreshing water because of the lemon and lime slices.
The food is served quite fast from the moment you order it. However, a suggestion for the staff would be to pay a bit more attention to the dinners and their requests. We waited quite a while to get the water.
Overall a good experience.
Regular customer here. Staff always attentive and friendly. Food is great but always forgot to take pictures so when i went earlier this week, i took one.

I dine frequently with friends at TCC Vivocity, and it never disappoints! The food is consistently fantastic, especially the seafood Aglio Olio. It‚Äôs TCC signature dish, an absolute must-try. The drinks are always refreshing and perfectly complement the meal. A special shoutout to Raymon, whose exceptional service and understanding of our preferences make dining here a pleasure every time. Highly recommend this branch!

üü£I went to TCC Cafe at Vivocity and had a coffee there.  üü© Located on Level 2, this cafe boasts beautiful harbour views that complements its elegant ambience.

üü° The modern decor, paired with plush grey sofa seating and soft lighting, gives off cosy and inviting vibes.

üíõ My Iced Cappuccino, priced at $7.80+, was reasonably priced, and expertly crafted with a rich & velvety texture. ‚óè The milky coffee was creamy and had a depth of flavours that shone through.

‚óè The gentleman who served me was warm, courteous, and added a personal touch to my visit.

‚¨õÔ∏è Overall, I am impressed by the well-crafted coffee, stunning views, and good  service at TCC.
